data.title: Ecological cooperation
data.text:
Finance

Offer exclusive financial products tailored for the travel market through collaborations with financial parties. The digitized remote management of operating vehicles enables vehicle owners to mitigate risks and gain credit. Comprehensive coverage through mortgages, platform-based withholding payments, and other methods ensures the security of assets for operators and the capital safety for financial parties.

Insurance

The big data model for integrated intelligent safety utilizes multidimensional data and precise management to minimize occurrences, compensation and liability. It promotes customized operational insurance for vehicle owners to lower insurance costs, assists insurers in reducing the ratio of claim for loss, thereby enhancing industry-wide cost reduction and profitability. Additionally, it offers insurance products for residual electric vehicle values, asset value preservation, and others.

Second-hand vehicle

The current vehicle agent channel facilitates convenient exchange of second-hand vehicles. We offer an official value-preserved buy-back of IT Box INJOY, ensuring value preservation after a three-year or five-year operational period, long-term vehicle management solutions for operators, and stable capital recycling for CPs.

Battery

Development of a charging/battery change ecology solution with multiple recharging options: We have developed an integrated ecology solution that combines charging and battery change, offering diversified recharging options. We join hands with full-ecology battery manufacturers, to achieve cascading battery utilization. We maximize resource utilization, to enhance sustainable development.

Modification

The official customized and modified vehicles cater to diverse customer needs and usage scenarios. These include efficient office travel vehicles for governments and enterprises, modified travel vehicles for multi-child families, and externally powered travel vehicles for outdoor enthusiasts' camping demands. They accurately meet the usage needs of various users in specific scenarios, enhancing their overall vehicle usage experience.
